items.name: Amplience
items.description: Amplience is a headless CMS that provides tools for creating, managing, and delivering dynamic content.

items.name: Contentful
items.description: Contentful is a flexible and scalable content platform for building digital experiences across multiple channels.

items.name: Contentstack
items.description: Contentstack offers a headless CMS solution that allows businesses to create and manage content with ease.

items.name: Hygraph
items.description: Hygraph is a powerful headless CMS designed for creating and delivering content-rich digital experiences.

items.name: Kontent.ai
items.description: Kontent.ai provides a modular content platform that supports collaboration and seamless content delivery.

items.name: Storyblok
items.description: Storyblok is a headless CMS that enables developers and content teams to create and manage content efficiently.

items.name: Agility CMS
items.description: Agility CMS offers a content-first headless CMS platform that is highly flexible and scalable.
